glsa.title: Mailman: Cross-site scripting vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: Mailman is vulnerable to cross-site scripting attacks.

background.p: Mailman is a Python-based mailing list server with an extensive web interface.

description.p: Florian Weimer has discovered a cross-site scripting vulnerability in the error messages that are produced by Mailman.

impact.p: By enticing a user to visiting a specially-crafted URL, an attacker can execute arbitrary script code running in the context of the victim's browser.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Mailman users should upgrade to the latest version:
